column4: does anyone know the official way to change video settings from a command line in intrepid? gdm is having trouble starting...
i believe the GDM resolution is set by xorg - and that means editing /etc/X11/xorg.conf
true. i need to change my video driver back to basic "nv", since it stopped working when i used proprietary drivers
again, that's something to be done in xorg.conf
